description:
The Sterling Rope Rope Tarp Plus with Pocket is a rope tarp that has a large pocket to store your rope and other climbing essentials.

  • It is made of rip-stop nylon, which is durable and lightweight
  • It has two loops to tie the ends of your rope, and a drawstring closure to secure the pocket
  • It is easy to carry and use, and it protects your rope from dirt and abrasion
name: Sterling Rope Rope Tarp Plus with Pocket
